title: 133: The Chocolate Haul Episode: Taste-Tests & All-Stars!
itunes:title: The Chocolate Haul Episode: Taste-Tests & All-Stars!
description: In this episode, Lisa and the gang are getting you ready for Valentine’s Day with some super-great chocolate finds like brownie bites, chocolate yogurt, chocolatey granola, chocolate bars, low-sugar caramels that taste like ROLOs, and SO MUCH MORE! Plus the find of all finds, a cocoa-coffee bar that Lisa declares is “the most unique product of the last decade!” The wait is over. Push play now, and then head on over to our Foodcast page for a list of products mentioned in the episode!
itunes:summary: This is for sure our sweetest haul yet… We’re trying a dozen chocolate finds this week on Chew the Right Thing!
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
